title: Using Feedback Loops from Computational Simulations as Resources for Sensemaking: A Case Study from Physical Chemistry
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4RP00017J, Paper
Andreas Haraldsrud, Tor Odden
Sensemaking is an important way of learning and engaging in science. Research has shown that sensemaking activities, such as questioning, hypothesizing, and model building, are pivotal in developing critical thinking...
